name: Puneic Lab (Rename Exe)
description:
Rename the game's executable! I accidentally renamed the game's executable to something that doesn't work. Rename it to VRGameJam2019.exe, and it will launch. This will be fixed after rating is over.

This game was made in the span of a week by three people for the VR Game Jam 2019. Any bugs will be fixed after rating is over (legitimately did not have time to test the build). Made using Unity 2019.3, and SteamVR 2.0.

Edit: There is currently a bug where "wrong solution" glasses that are thrown away can no longer be poured. For now, please use "new" glasses when ruining chemical mixes.

------------------------------------

A bio-engineered super-virus has been released, and is slowly crawling across the earth. It causes auditory and visual hallucinations. And within 5 minutes, death. An epidemic has began.

You have 5 minutes to come up with the cure, before it's too late.

------------------------------------
